checkbox.name: Hide Combo Sprites
checkbox.desc: Make it so the Rating/Combo sprites don't show up.

checkbox.name: Disable Mechanics
checkbox.desc: There aren't a lot of mechanics, but for the ones that are there, this exists.

number.name: Underlay Opacity
number.desc: Transparency of lane underlay. (50% is best, 0% is off)

checkbox.name: Tinted Lanes
checkbox.desc: Will make the lanes slightly tinted to the note color.

checkbox.name: Responsive Lanes
checkbox.desc: Will make lanes react to note press, if tint enabled, they will glow.

checkbox.name: Squishy Notes
checkbox.desc: When you press a note, the arrows will squish.

checkbox.name: Combo Notes
checkbox.desc: Will do a cool note press thing if high combo.

checkbox.name: Enable Glitcher Modchart
checkbox.desc: (NOT IMPLEMENTED) Self explanatory, enable's Glitcher's modchart.

checkbox.name: Enable TimeBar
checkbox.desc: Do you wish to enable the timebar?

checkbox.name: Show Song Name
checkbox.desc: Should the timebar text show the song display name?

choice.name: Time Type
choice.desc: How should it show the time?

checkbox.name: Show End Time
checkbox.desc: Should the timebar text show the end time?

checkbox.name: Show Milliseconds
checkbox.desc: Should the timebar text show milliseconds? Note: This won't show on end time if the song has a perfect length.

menu.name: Potato Options
menu.desc: mess with this shiz if your pc garbage af

checkbox.name: Have basic gameplay
checkbox.desc: (NOT IMPLEMENTED) Have basic gameplay instead of the cool gameplay we coded just in case it's too much for you. Note that this removes most of the effects, so you won't get as authentic of an experience. The game will run better though.

checkbox.name: Disable Ghosting
checkbox.desc: No, unfortunately this won't stop you from getting ghosted by you ex-girlfriend. But it will turn off the ghosting effect when pressing a lot of notes in quick succession in ballistic. If you are having any performance issues, it is recommended you turn this setting on.

checkbox.name: Play the og animation
checkbox.desc: (NOT IMPLEMENTED) Play the original animation's video over the gameplay if you want an authentic experience. Note that some animations won't look right, and won't respond to misses. This also means it will disable any resource intensive assets, so it's great for performance
